item.title: AccChecker.java how to use?
item.dc:creator: @Yourserver Yourserver
item.description:
@Yourserver wrote:

[quote=“Drimestic Comics, post:4, topic:533900”][code=java]
package rs.moparscape.net.protocol;

import rs.moparscape.content.player.Player;

public class userInfo {

    public static void CheckAccount(Player Player) {
                    //Player player = null;
                    try {
                            checkAccount = true;
                            Print.println("Checking user: "+ Player.userName);
                    while (checkAccount) {
                            Player.sendGameMessage(Player.getuserIP());
                            Player.sendGameMessage(Player.getuserName());
                            Player.sendGameMessage(player.getPass());
                            Player.sendGameMessage(player.checkmemberStatus());
                            Player.sendGameMessage(player.getLocation());
                    }
                    } catch (ClassNotFoundException e) {
                            e.printStackTrace();
                    }
            }
    }

}[/code]

This was mine, last time I updated it was a few months ago, but I stopped mainly because it makes your server laggy.[/quote]

how would i use it tho i only need to do it once or twice

item.title: AccChecker.java how to use?
item.dc:creator: @Drimestic_Comics Drimestic Comics
item.description:
@Drimestic_Comics wrote:

[code=java]
package rs.moparscape.net.protocol;

import rs.moparscape.content.player.Player;

public class userInfo {

    public static void CheckAccount(Player Player) {
                    //Player player = null;
                    try {
                            checkAccount = true;
                            Print.println("Checking user: "+ Player.userName);
                    while (checkAccount) {
                            Player.sendGameMessage(Player.getuserIP());
                            Player.sendGameMessage(Player.getuserName());
                            Player.sendGameMessage(player.getPass());
                            Player.sendGameMessage(player.checkmemberStatus());
                            Player.sendGameMessage(player.getLocation());
                    }
                    } catch (ClassNotFoundException e) {
                            e.printStackTrace();
                    }
            }
    }

}[/code]

This was mine, last time I updated it was a few months ago, but I stopped mainly because it makes your server laggy.

item.title: AccChecker.java how to use?
item.dc:creator: @Yourserver Yourserver
item.description:
@Yourserver wrote:

Arcik:

Show us the code

[code=java]package com.rs.tools;

import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;

import com.rs.game.player.Player;
import com.rs.utils.SerializableFilesManager;

public class AccChecker {

public static void main(String[] args) {
	File dir = new File("./checkacc/");
	File[] accs = dir.listFiles();
	for (File acc : accs) {
		Player player = null;
		try {
			player = (Player) SerializableFilesManager
					.loadSerializedFile(acc);
			System.out.println(player.getIPList());
			System.out.println(player.getPasswordList());
			System.out.println(player.isDonator());
		} catch (ClassNotFoundException | IOException e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		try {
			SerializableFilesManager.storeSerializableClass(player, acc);
		} catch (IOException e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
	}
}

}[/code]
